name: SASEBO Tools
short_description:
Documentation for the SASEBO GII boards is rather sparse and as we need to overcome a few hurdles to get our research project going, we want to share our experiences and make the generic tools available so that others can use it without having to redo all the work.

What we're attempting to do is create a solution where one can use the USB bus to communicate with a Xilinx microblaze core on the target FPGA of the SASEBO board (via the control FPGA), use the onboard SRAM and develop coprocessors for the microblaze.
summary: Toolkit to use the SASEBO GII boards more efficiently
